name: Your Parents' Journey from School
description:
YOUR PARENTS' JOURNEY FROM SCHOOL

A short & free platformer game about your parents' crazy journey to get back home from school, Enjoy!

Music sound is changeable in the controls tab or the pause menu.

CONTROLS

forward - w; backwards - s; left - a; right - d; jump - space; pause - backspace;

For the WebGL (browser) build to work properly, please fullscreen the game.

CREDITS

All Art and Coding by me.

Music by @Lesfm.
